column1:
program=
R =
    Integral[
        If[
            Extract[EvalStart, "HOUR_OF_DAY", "Europe/Rome"] < 12
            &&
            Start >= EvalStart
            &&
            Stop <= EvalStop,
            Integral[1, Every[1, "HOUR_OF_DAY", "Europe/Rome"]],
            Integral[0]
        ],
        Every[1, "DAY_OF_MONTH", "Europe/Rome"]
    ]
